events.name: More Herringbone
events.description: Another brief description of musical act.

announcements.name: Gift certificates available
announcements.description: River Festival gift certificates make the perfect Christmas present for River Festival lovers of all ages! Available in $20 increments, certificates can be used at the Festival to purchase works from any of the art areas. Certificates can be purchased at the Salina Arts & Humanities office, 211 W. Iron Ave, M-F 8-12, 1-5pm.

faq.question: First Aid
faq.answer: First Aid and EMS services are available at the permanent restroom next to the tennis courts.

faq.question: Lost & Found
faq.answer: Visit the Festival's Lost & Found booth near the Fourth Street Bridge to scope out misplaced items. Lost children also are escorted here to be reunited with parents. Lost & Found is located south of Festival Headquarters
